clothe/ornament. As additional souls are gathered unto Zion, they will add to the glory of those already there. As fine clothing or expensive jewelry are to a bride, so will the souls of those gathered be to the Church.

bind/bride. In Zion, we bind ourselves to others with a bond of charity. This binding, which brings us to union and oneness, is the very essence of Zion. Binding might also refer to the ordinance of sealing. In various scriptures, the bride is depicted as being the Saints (61:10), the Church (D&C 109:73-74), and the New Jerusalem (Rev. 21:2). In this verse, the bride represents those who join Zion.
